title: League won't start after pressing launch
body: a week ago league suddenly wouldn't start, after pressing launch it would just disappear from task manager after 2 seconds and would take multiple restarts just to get it to work. I've tried the avast fix and uninstalling then installing again, but the issue still persists.

replies.body: probably the pc, happens to me too, it opens, just slowly, i try to open it twice so it gives me a notification that i'm trying to open 2 and need to close one, i click ok and in about 10 seconds the client launches

Since it takes multiple restarts in order to work, it's likely the issue stems from a problem connecting to the patching service. I strongly recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step in troubleshooting this.

Let me know if those steps helped.
